content.json:
## User drilldown workbook
---
**Note:** All data in this workbook excludes whitelisted events.

parameters.name: time_span
parameters.label: Timespan
parameters.description: Selects time range of the drilldown

parameters.name: user_name_value
parameters.label: User name
parameters.description: Selects the username to target during drilldown
parameters.query:
Sysmon
| where isnotempty(technique_name)
| summarize by UserName

content.title: User activity by technique
User activity by host

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where (EventID == 4771 and FailureReason != 0x19) or EventID == 4625
| where Account contains split(@"{user_name_value}", @"\")[1]
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
content.title: Authentication Failures over time

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where (EventID == 4771 and FailureReason != 0x19) or EventID == 4624
| summarize count() by Account, Computer
| project Account, Computer
content.title: Authentication failures by user and host

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4624
| summarize count() by Account, Computer, LogonType
| project Account, Computer, LogonType
content.title: Authentication success by user and host

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4720
content.title: EventID 4720 - SA Accounts are excluded

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4722
content.title: EventID 4722 - SA and Computer Accounts are excluded

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4726
content.title: EventID 4726 - SA and Computer Accounts are excluded

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where (EventID==4720 or EventID==4738 or EventID==4728 or EventID==4732 or EventID==4746 or EventID==4751 or EventID==4756 or EventID==4761)
content.title: Accounts Created or Changed and Added to Group

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where (EventID==4738 or EventID==4729 or EventID==4733 or EventID==4747 or EventID==4752 or EventID==4756 or EventID==4762) and Account contains @"{user_name_value}"
content.title: Accounts Changed and Removed from Group(s)

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID==4740 and Account contains @"{user_name_value}"
content.title: Accounts Locked Out

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID==4767 and Account contains @"{user_name_value}"
content.title: Accounts Unlocked

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID==4725 and Account contains @"{user_name_value}"
content.title: Accounts Disabled

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID==4781 and Account contains @"{user_name_value}"
content.title: Accounts Renamed

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID==4723 and Account contains @"{user_name_value}"
content.title: Accounts Password Changed by user

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID==4724 and Account contains @"{user_name_value}"
content.title: Account Password Change by administrator
Process Create
Process Access
File Created
Image Loaded
Network Connection
Create Remote Thread
content.noDataMessage: No create remote thread events for selected time generated

content.title: Registry Access
Pipes
content.noDataMessage: No pipe create and connect events for selected time and user

content.json:
---
User drilldown v.1.3.0, built by **Edoardo Gerosa**
